name: PixelOS
changelog:
• source changelogs (i don't know where they are)
  • added gamespace
  • fixed some minor bugs
  • due to some problems with Magisk, ROM now comes with KSU-Next + SUSfs by default. (in case you prefer to not have root, you can use the #rootless_noname note on the group to get non-root kernel. note that flashing magisk on that kernel will cause bootloop.)
  • something I don't remember
notes:
• due to some problems with Magisk, ROM now comes with KSU-Next + SUSfs by default. (in case you prefer to not have root, you can use the #rootless_noname note on the group to get non-root kernel. note that flashing magisk on that kernel will cause bootloop.)
  • Known issues: low mic volume, torch strength doesn't work (yet) [???]
  • With Gapps
  • KSU-Next + SUSfs
  • Installation instructions: telegra.ph
